questions.question: You are a student with an A2 proficiency in English. Your class teacher will ask you a question. You should answer this question with the minimum of 60 words. Share a memory of a holiday. Where was it; who went; what happenedâ€¦?

answers.answer: Last summer, my family and I went on a holiday to Greece. We spent a week on the beautiful island of Santorini. It was my first time there, and I was amazed by the stunning blue waters, white buildings, and colorful sunsets. One day, we rented a boat and sailed around the island. We swam in the crystal-clear waters of the Red Beach and visited the ancient city of Akrotiri. It was an unforgettable experience, and I can't wait to go back again!
